select 0 dept_no, null upper_dept_no, company_name dept_name, 0 ord, 0 depth, null last_dno, company_no from tbl_company where company_no = #{companyNo} union all
select dept_no, upper_dept_no, dept_name, ord, depth, last_dno, company_no from tbl_dept where (upper_dept_no = #{upperDeptNo} OR upper_dept_no is null )and depth = #{depth} and company_no = #{companyNo}

select e.emp_no , em.orga_no , e.emp_name , em.emp_rank , e.username , FN_GET_HIERARCHY_ORGA(#{orgaNo}) as path , e.emp_phone from tbl_emp e join tbl_emp_mapping em on e.emp_no = em.emp_no join tbl_orga o on o.orga_no=em.orga_no where o.upper_orga_no=#{orgaNo} ;
select e.emp_no , e.emp_name , em.emp_rank , FN_GET_HIERARCHY_ORGA(#{empNo}) as path , e.emp_phone , e.email from tbl_emp e join tbl_emp_mapping em on e.emp_no = em.emp_no where em.emp_no=#{empNo} ;
